response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. This product holds significant worth to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its exceptional quality and utility. Considering its immense value to you at $1,200,000, we aim to bridge this gap with an offer that respects both our interests. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,350,000. This offer allows us to achieve a substantial return on our investment while ensuring that you receive a product that meets or exceeds your expectations. We believe this is a fair and mutually beneficial arrangement. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
